title: Bug 23787 - Project Properties Info page should not use text fields
description: Integration build 09/17. The Project Properties Info page in the Properties dialog is using text fields instead of labels. This looks bad on all motif platforms.
OB: On the Project Properties Info page in the Properties dialog, text fields are displayed instead of labels for certain fields like Path, Type, etc.
EB: The Project Properties Info page should display these fields as read-only labels instead of text fields.
SR:
To reproduce the issue: 
1. Select a project. 
2. Right-click and select 'Properties'. 
3. Navigate to the 'Info' page. 
4. Observe that the text fields are displayed instead of read-only labels for fields like Path, Type, etc.
